runs.comm: Starc gets the ball to swing back in from outside off, Amla gets an inside edge to the on side
keeps it nice and straight, Amla goes back and defends this one
nicely past cover, he went forward to a half volley and put a lot of power behind the drive, Maxwell fumbled and the ball had enough in it to reach the rope
he sprayed that really wide outside the off stump
much better from Starc, comes back in and the ball hits him high on the pad as he tries to flick
walked across his crease and looked to whip it down to fine leg but mistimed it and the ball dropped short of short fine leg
Amla tries to repeat that, walks a long way across and exposes the leg stump, the ball clips his pad and lobs to the keeper, stifled appeal
this was pitched up and de Kock bashed it down the track and straight to the bowler
this was on the pads and de Kock moved across and played a one legged pull down to deep square leg
no foot movement and Amla looks to force this through the off side, beaten this time
another desperate attempt at scoring, he makes room this time and he swishes and misses
well Amla's misery ends! After failing to connect the previous two balls he hits this one back to the bowler, Coulter-Nile shows good reflexes to hang on to it in his follow through
half hearted appeal for a caught behind, lands it outside off and moves away, Faf was forward to defend and replays showed the ball taking the edge, lucky escape
he goes back and punches it to the off side
drops it short and de Kock goes back and pulls him down to long-on, the bat slips out of de Kock's hand while taking the second run
down the track and he lofts this one down to long-on, falls short
the wrong 'un and he goes back and works it to midwicket
gives it a bit more air and de Kock slogs too early and can't connect, the ball hits his pad and rolls away
can't get that one away, he tries to force it to the leg side and mistimes it
at last a boundary, this was pitched up outside off, mid-off was up, de Kock went well forward and slammed it over that fielder
take that! Another one pitched up on the slot, de Kock goes well forward and scoops it over the sightscreen, Watto's bleeding runs
brave enough to pitch it up again, this was drilled down the ground to long-off, fielder's back
cuts on the up and the ball just drops short of backward point
goes for the yorker and de Kock makes room and drives but can't beat backward point
pitched up again and he makes room and scoops it square, over backward point
he makes a bit of room and he tries to poke it to the off side but misses
well played, it was dragged shorter and Faf went down the track and smashed it over the bowler's head
Faf walks across his stumps and looks to scoop this one over fine leg but he's beaten
shot! Faf continues to walk down the track and this time he connects a half volley and sends it soaring over wide long-off
one more! Christian bowls length and he is punished, Faf pulls this one with ease and it goes over deep square leg and they can't find the ball
Christian bowls with the replacement ball and it's full and wide and Faf crashes it to deep cover, the sweeper cuts it off
De Kock bisects the gap to perfection! From round the wicket and it's a low full  toss and he chips it with power down to deep midwicket, the two deep fielders had no chance
god slower ball, foxed the batsman as he looked to slog and missed
fires that full outside off and he smashes it to deep cover
the bowler needn't blame himself for that one, on the stumps and he makes room and gets an inside edge that beats the keeper
full and wide and he makes room and mistimes it to cover
heads up over long-on! Low full toss, the wet ball the culprit again, de Kock stays there and gives it a whack, high in the air and far too
Faf makes room and the ball swings towards the stumps, outside edge goes racing to third man who's very fine, just a single
this was fired in quick, the yorker a bit too good for de Kock, he fails to dig it out
good ball, another yorker and he can only squeeze this to the on side
that six spoils a good over by Starc, didn't get his length right, pitched up and de Kock lofts him down to the sight screen
now he tries the short one and pays for it, de Kock walks down the pitch and smashed it over deep square leg, the fielder had no chance
that's a bonus! Starc was looking to bowl a yorker and ended up dragging it wide down the leg side and five wides, too much for Haddin
and ends with a dot ball! Funny old over, de Kock went down the pitch looking to smash it straight, completely beaten
